name: Gotta' GetAway
description:
Laying low in rural Kentucky in the midst of a Pandemic, Roary finds himself with only a cannon, a couple rocket packs, and one goal: Just Get Away.

The state, with lack of help from the Federal Government, has supplied what it has on hand. The state is now littered with L'ville Slugg'r baseball bats, that seem to have wonderful cat flinging properties.

Launch yourself out of your cannon, and use your rocket boosts to launch from bat to bat while you avoid the Virus, the dreaded Ohio Valley Allergens, and of course those infected still walking around not heeding Uncle Andy's advice.

As you make your GetAway, you'll come across newly valuable commodities like toilet paper, and soap which you can also sell to upgrade your arsenal. (Selling at a reasonable price, to only those who really need it of course!)

Controls:

Aim Cannon - Click and Drag
Fire Cannon - Release Mouse Button
Left Rocket: Left Arrow or "A" key
Right Rocket: Right Arrow or "D" key
